name: Knockback (shava59)
description:
Most of you have probably seen or played top-down shooters before.

But have you heard of a top-down shooter in which shooting knocks you backwards... and that's the only way you can move?  Knockback is a fun little experience that puts a twist in top-down shooters. Blast through a tutorial and 3 other challenging levels, including a boss fight. The question is... can you beat them all?

This game was made with Game Maker Studio 2.
